mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation_tbl r, host_tbl h, reservation_detail_tbl rdt, employee_tbl e WHERE r.host_code = #{host_code} AND h.host_code = r.host_code AND e.employee_code = r.employee_code AND rdt.res_detail_code = r.res_detail_code AND r.res_state = '서비스 완료' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(r.employee_code,2)) DESC
